attributes.action: Hand The Regulation of MPs Salaries to an Independent Organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The same MPs that voted against essential public sector workers getting well deserved payrises then voted to award themselves a massive one. There is nothing the PM can do to stop them doing it because they get to unfairly vote on it. I feel an independent body should regulate MPs salaries for fairness
